[tatsu_section padding= "90px 0% 90px 0%"][tatsu_row layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][tatsu_text max_width= "75" wrap_alignment= "center" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

Welcome to Oshine

A beautiful responsive multi-purpose wordpress theme that comes with 12 unique and stunning demos. We have crafted each and every demo with extensive care and precision and the theme is power packed yet easy to use.

[/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][tatsu_row layout= "1/3+1/3+1/3"][tatsu_column layout= "1/3"][tatsu_icon name= "icon-strategy" size= "medium" style= "circle" bg_color= "#efefef" hover_bg_color= "#60c2d3" color= "#60c2d3" hover_color= "#ffffff" border_width= "0" border_color= "#000000" hover_border_color= "#eb4949" alignment= "center" href= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" lightbox= "0"][/tatsu_icon][tatsu_text max_width= "" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

item.title: Page Builder V6
item.dc:creator: brandexponents
item.content:encoded:
[tatsu_section bg_color= "#151515" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "center center" bg_stretch= "1" bg_animation= "none" border_color= "" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" overlay_color= "" section_id= "" full_screen_header_scheme= "background--dark" padding= "125px 0% 0px 0%" bg_size= "cover" border= "0px 0px px 0px"][tatsu_row layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][tatsu_text max_width= "60" wrap_alignment= "left" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

Oshine - Wordpress Theme

A Multi-Purpose wordpress theme with 12 stunning & unique demos. Crafted with passion & perfections

[/tatsu_text][portfolio_navigation_module title_align= "center" nav_links_color= "#ffffff" animation_type= "fadeIn"][/portfolio_navigation_module][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][tatsu_row no_margin_bottom= "1" equal_height_columns= "0" full_width= "0" gutter= "medium" layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][tatsu_text max_width= "" animation_type= "fadeIn"][/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section][tatsu_section bg_color= "" bg_repeat= "repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_animation= "none" border_color= "" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" overlay_color= "" section_id= "" full_screen_header_scheme= "background--light" padding= "0px 0% 90px 0%" border= "0px 0px px 0px"][tatsu_row no_margin_bottom= "1" equal_height_columns= "0" full_width= "0" gutter= "medium" layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][tatsu_text max_width= "" animation_type= "fadeIn"][/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][tatsu_row layout= "1/4+1/4+1/2"][tatsu_column layout= "1/4"][tatsu_empty_space height= "1"][/tatsu_empty_space][/tatsu_column][tatsu_column layout= "1/4"][tatsu_text max_width= "" animation_type= "fadeIn"][/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][tatsu_column layout= "1/2"][tatsu_title_icon icon= "icon-grid" size= "medium" alignment= "left" style= "circled" icon_bg= "#10cca9" icon_color= "#ffffff" icon_border_color= "" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

Page Builder

Oshine comes with our powerful custom drag & drop page builder. With visual previews in the backend and with unique features like copy & paste, you will fall in love with this super fast builder.[/tatsu_title_icon][tatsu_title_icon icon= "icon-icon_heart_alt" size= "medium" alignment= "left" style= "circled" icon_bg= "#10cca9" icon_color= "#ffffff" icon_border_color= "" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

Modern Design

Oshine has a striking balance between beautiful design and functionality. Each demo has been carefully crafted & with balanced typography and unique layouts you can easily create a great looking websites.[/tatsu_title_icon][tatsu_title_icon icon= "icon-infinity" size= "medium" alignment= "left" style= "circled" icon_bg= "#10cca9" icon_color= "#ffffff" icon_border_color= "" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

Unlimited Portfolios

With Variable gutters, multiple columns, gradient overlays, 8 hover options, 7 Title styles, likeable items and many more options, Oshine literally provides unlimited ways to present your work.[/tatsu_title_icon][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section][tatsu_section bg_color= "" bg_image= "" bg_repeat= "repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_animation= "none" border_color= "" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "1" overlay_color= "rgba(0,0,0,0.75)" section_id= "" section_title= "" full_screen_header_scheme= "background--dark" padding= "120px 0% 120px 0%" border= "0px 0px px 0px"][tatsu_row layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][content_slides slide_animation_type= "slide" slide_show= "1" slide_show_speed= "4000" content_max_width= "100" animation_type= "fadeIn"][content_slide][/content_slide][content_slide][/content_slide][content_slide][/content_slide][content_slide][/content_slide][content_slide][/content_slide][/content_slides][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]
